title: [HTML][HTML] Body feed filtration provides enhanced bioprocessing
snippet:
Continuous improvements in growth media and cell lines have elevated biomass 
concentrations in bioprocesses, subsequently challenging the downstream purification process. 
Sartorius Stedim Biotech’s body feed filtration-based solution is designed to address this issue …
